title: T206 J.J. Clarke SOLD SOLD SOLD

posts.post_title: T206 J.J. Clarke SOLD SOLD SOLD
posts.post_content:
I bought this on eBay a few weeks back and it just doesn't quite fit into my collection. I bought it from our good Net54 friend, Dan McKee, who said in the listing: "Sharp card but may be trimmed on top border.  Has not been submitted for grading."

I haven't measured it. You be the judge.

Original eBay auction here, with scans:
[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/280749963974[/url]

SOLD SOLD SOLD
Check, money order, or PayPal.

Emails have priority:
[url]trae@t206.org[/url]

Thanks for looking :)
